alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wood, northwestern Portage and south central Marathon Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Marshfield, or 15 miles north of Wisconsin Rapids, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mosinee around 345 PM CDT. Wausau, Weston and Rib Mountain around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Milladore, Sherry, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Moon, Schofield, Auburndale, Blenker, Dancy, Camp Phillips Scout Camp and Junction City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
